bskill: Node js, Nestjs, and Django Developer
about: A seasoned Full-Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience across consulting, health-tech, and logistics sectors. I am proficient in both relational databases—such as MySQL, Microsoft SQL Server, and PostgreSQL—as well as non-relational databases like MongoDB. My development experience includes building e-commerce platforms, company-specific dashboards, and APIs that power mobile applications.  My core programming languages are Python and JavaScript. For front-end development, I primarily work with Angular, and on the back end, I utilize Flask, Django, Node.js, and NestJS to create robust services. Known for my collaboration skills and team-oriented mindset, I am always eager to learn and continuously enhance my technical expertise.

projects.title: Twikkie
projects.info: Twikkie is a human resource management web application. It manages employees, departments, leaves, attendance, payroll, and more.

projects.title: Safe sky
projects.info: Safe sky is an enterprise administrative web application used to manage flights from departure to arrival. It provides both quick and detail overview including graphical analytics of all operations. It provides real time flight details, drag and drop, creating new flight strips with on screen keyboard
projects.techStack: Angular | Tailwind  | Angular Material | Netlify | AWS | Typescript

projects.info: This project is a clone of netflix website powered by IMDB api and youtube. It is a work in progress but you can get all the latest movies and tv shows
